verses.name: Acts 2:6
verses.text: Now when this was noised abroad, the multitude came together, and were confounded, because that every man heard them speak in his own language.

verses.name: Acts 2:7
verses.text: And they were all amazed and marvelled, saying one to another, Behold, are not all these which speak Galileans?

verses.name: Acts 2:8
verses.text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue, wherein we were born?

verses.name: Acts 2:9
verses.text: Parthians, and Medes, and Elamites, and the dwellers in Mesopotamia, and in Judea, and Cappadocia, in Pontus, and Asia,

verses.name: Acts 2:10
verses.text: Phrygia, and Pamphylia, in Egypt, and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene, and strangers of Rome, Jews and proselytes,
